csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

    <citation>
        <layout>
            <date variable="issued" prefix="(" suffix=")">
                <date-part name="month" form="long"/>
                <date-part name="day" suffix=", "/>
                <date-part name="year"/>
            </date>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
